meanings.sent1: Her pluckiness in facing her fears inspired others to be brave too.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's pluckiness saved the kitten from the burning building.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her pluckiness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The pluckiness of the underdog team led them to victory against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The pluckiness of the young soldier in battle was truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: His pluckiness in finding a solution to the problem impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The explorer's pluckiness in the face of danger led to many discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The pluckiness of the squirrel trying to reach the bird feeder was comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her pluckiness in negotiating a better deal was like a master chess player's move.
meanings.sent5: The pluckiness of the young entrepreneur in starting her own business was truly inspiring.
